title: Oppressor or Bount Hunter?
body: I was just wondering what would be the better mastery for Teemo,Oppressor or Bounty Hunter?If you can tell me your thoughts and options that would help alot.

replies.body: I would say Oppressor Would be better for the King Teemo.
Oppressor. You're probably not going to kill many different people and Oppressor works well with Teemo. Rylai's is pretty common and shrooms are increased damage by default.

Bounty hunter, in my opinion. Teemo late game should be able to secure a bunch of kills in the early to mid-game, creating some pretty heavy nuke mushrooms. However, if you don't seem to be getting kills with Teemo or tend to lose the early game pretty hard, Oppressor is definitely a safer pick at the cost of a potential 2.5% in the later stages of the match.
